forecast.name: This Afternoon
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny. High near 65, with temperatures falling to around 63 in the afternoon. West wind 9 to 13 mph, with gusts as high as 18 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly cloudy, with a low around 54. West southwest wind 6 to 12 mph.

weather_report:
As the afternoon unfurls in Downtown San Francisco, a gentle warmth dances through the streets, cradled by a fantastic blue sky punctuated by wispy clouds. The forecast whispers of a high near 65, and though it seems the sun is dutifully holding court, temperatures will begin to soften into the mid-60s as the day unfolds, kissed by a playful westward breeze that brings a touch of freshness. The coastal air remains relatively clear, with only hints of the city's notorious fog lurking at its edges, a reminder of more temperate evenings yet to come.

As twilight approaches, expect the embrace of clouds as they wrap the neighborhood in a cozy layer, bringing temperatures down to a blissful 54 degrees by nightfall. This evening would suit a light jacket, perhaps, paired with a soft scarf to ward off the occasional cool wind whispering through the streets. This is the perfect time to wander along the waterfront where the reflections of the city blend with the serene waters, or to stop by a local café, perhaps to sip a warm brew while savoring the mingling aromas of fresh pastries and roasted beans. Embrace this captivating spring day, where each corner of the city invites you to pause, breathe, and appreciate the life pulsing all around.
